title: Systematic Mathematics Foundation Course for Adult Learners: Enhancing Problem-Solving Abilities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Focused on cultivating practical mathematical skills for solving everyday problems in smartphone-based learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life problems (e.g., daily budget calculations, discount rate applications) with 80% accuracy through 10-minute mobile content
Learners can successfully perform public utility bill calculations using fraction and decimal operations three consecutive times following explicit instructions
In project-based assessments, learners can write reports applying mathematical concepts to local community issues (e.g., calculating community garden area)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
